TopicTitle: With an account, can you get it on another computer for free?

Articles.Content:
I have an account on kerbalspaceprogram.com, which I used to buy it for my PC.  If I log in to my account later, there's a button to download ksp.  Can I download ksp onto my Mac for free if I purchased it?  

Nevermind, it says it in the faqs.

Please close this thread.

 

Certainly, you can download and play the game on all of your personal computers with the same license. Even if some are Windows and some are mac computers.
